description:
Dazai and Chuya are middle schoolers who just can’t seem to get along.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dazai Chuuya 14-sai (Chuunibyou) / Toaru Yokohama no Ichinichi / Shounen to Koinu
Dazai and Chuuya, Pretentious Fourteen-Year-Olds / A Day in Yokohama / The Boy and the Puppy
太宰・中也14歳(中二病) / とある横浜の一日 / 小年と子犬
